### Changelog 20171113
# AIMROM V2.5 UPDATE! -Merge October security patch
# Let's AIM-ify
# Lenovo P2 (kuntao) specific changes:-
-update prime (wifi driver) to LA.UM.5.6.r1-06200-89xx.0 -Fixed fp gestures thx highwaystar -Reverted to stock audio hal for now oss is little unstable -google assistant is triggered when homebutton is pressed twice instead of long press
---
# Note :
_Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
